channel.title: Editing teleportation spells (or adding to them)
channel.description: I want to change the location of some of my teleports (like the pk area and stuff to send the player to different coords) :)

item.title: Editing teleportation spells (or adding to them)
item.dc:creator: @KillinXxSMile KillinXxSMile
item.description:
@KillinXxSMile wrote:

nerdboyxx:

you’ve been a huge help dude, I changed my home teleport and my teleports to the locations I wanted so it is heaps more tidy now. Thanks again

No Problem any time

item.title: Editing teleportation spells (or adding to them)
item.dc:creator: @KillinXxSMile KillinXxSMile
item.description:
@KillinXxSMile wrote:

Okay since you use both of them im guessing there is already some there and you just wish to change them…

all you have to do is in your client class (client.java)
search for these cases
and change the **** of below
teleportToX = ****;
teleportToY = ****;
and i guess if you want you could change what the msg sends you every time you tele there…

@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
i am not 100% sure that these are all of the cases for the magic teleports
@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@

case 4140:
case 4143:
case 4146:
case 4150:
case 6004:
case 6005:
case 29031:
case 72038:
case 50235:
case 50245:
case 50253:
case 51005:
case 51013:
case 51023:
case 51031:
case 51039:

item.source: Editing teleportation spells (or adding to them)

item.title: Editing teleportation spells (or adding to them)
item.dc:creator: @KillinXxSMile KillinXxSMile
item.description:
@KillinXxSMile wrote:

go first of all for the tab/running man teleports
to change the coords of the tele your gonna have to know the name of what the command is
if you don’t know the name

go into your client.java
and search for case 168:
you will see something like

if(teleblock == true){
sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); 
}
else
{
customCommand("####");
}
break;

what we are looking for is this line
customCommand("####");
we want the #### out of that line…

for most servers case 168: is home
to find out other teleports such as train or what ever you can either just scroll down from case 168: or search for cusomtomCommand("

ok once you have the name of the command you need to find
public void customCommand(String command) {
now your going to scroll down till you find #### or you can just simply search for it

once you find #### it will look something like this

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("####")) {
            if (teleblock == true) {
                sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting.");
            } else {
                teleportToX = ****; // THIS IS WHAT YOU WANT TO CHANGE
                teleportToY = ****; // THIS IS WHAT YOU WANT TO CHANGE
		heightLevel = 0;
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                sendMessage("Blah blah......!");
}
        }

it may not look exactly like this because i just thought of this off my head but it will look pretty close…
so what you want to do is…
see where it says teleportToX = ****;
your gonna want to change that with the x coordinate of where you want the new place to be
and teleportToY = ****;
change that with the y coordinate of where you want the new place to be

… that should answer your question on how to change it through the tabs/running man
ill add another reply on how to change it through magics in a second…
if you need any help just ask me

EDIT:
just another question are you using normal magic teleports or ancient magic teleports or even both?

Read full topic

item.title: Editing teleportation spells (or adding to them)
item.dc:creator: @nerdboyxx nerdboyxx
item.description:
@nerdboyxx wrote:

So what you are saying is go to client.java and edit the teleports from there? what exactly do I type in the find search bar to find tele spells?

I use both, I use the emote tab to tele AND the magics to teleport.

item.title: Editing teleportation spells (or adding to them)
item.dc:creator: @KillinXxSMile KillinXxSMile
item.description:
@KillinXxSMile wrote:

I’m guessing this is for 317 since you seem new to java

to teleport are you using the tab’s?
hmm… i guess you could call it the running man icon?
or are you using the magics to teleport?

if your using the tab’s just go into your client.java and search for the place you want to change and change the coords.

if you need more help on this ask me
